mean_cn: n. 【语】语法，有秩序的排列，句子构造，句法
mean_en: the way in which words are put together to form phrases, clauses, or sentences
word_etyma: syn一起 + tax排列 → 把单词排列成句子的方法 → syntax 句法
short_phrase: the syntax of the English language
sentence: The basic syntax of most English sentences is 'subject - verb - object'.
